Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Overlord Gunship
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Overlord Gunship is a dominant aerial force. With a sleek design, battle-worn plating, and Gothic embellishments, it symbolizes the Imperium's might in the 41st millennium.

Adorned with scars from numerous dogfights, the Overlord Gunship's streamlined silhouette highlights its role as a symbol of Imperial dominance. Armed with a devastating array of weaponry, it serves as a harbinger of destruction against any challengers to the Imperium's supremacy.

Soaring through turbulent skies, the Overlord Gunship embodies the relentless spirit of the Imperium, acting as a guardian against airborne threats and symbolizing unyielding strength in the perilous theater of GrimWorld 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x40
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
